name: Tug n' Pull
description:
A 1v1 duel to the death in a pit of dooming lava. Both players try to make their way up, landing on platforms as they go, keeping their distance from the lava. One wrong jump is the end of you and your opponent takes the win!  Or you can pull him off of his platform or while he's jumping to the next and catch him midair!

After completing the tutorial, restart the game to return to the menu to play normally.  (sorry for the inconvenience... )

First game jam, had loads of fun, hope you have just as much while playing our 2 Player game!

Made by 2 game devs. 

pixel art all made by one of the developers!
